title: (x) condensed grotesque and extended sans - Univers, Engravers/Sackers/Blair {Ken, Eben; Lex, Mark S}
content:
Any idea what these fonts are? Folio is the closest I've found.. this is the ONLY image of logo I have to work from..

comments.content: Tough to say but I would guess Univers
The small type could also be Copperplate Gothic.
